column4: can i get the packages of postgresql 8.0.2, php 5.0.4 (with postgresql support) and apache for installing offline on a ubuntu box?
do you know if i can get the packages of postgresql, php and apache for installing on a ubuntu box that is currently offline?
i can get the source, but i don't have gcc and some development stuff there
can please anyone answer my question?
just type those commands I gave you into a terminal
what apps are you truing to install /
sudo apt-get clean && apt-get -d install packages (this only downloads files) copy them to cd and install to your offline system
the packages will be somewhere in the /var/cache/apt/ directory
you probably have to add the universe repository
can you tell me how to do that?
let me get you a link on the wiki
